channel.title: 667/728 read below
channel.description: So to start off i wanna know if there is a way to make a live update instead of turning the server off to compile and i make it where when i compile it say's system update? and it start counting down?

item.title: 667/728 read below
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

Just compile, then do update 60 (or however much time you want), then when the timer hits zero, ‘x’ out of the runserver and re-start it…?

Read full topic
